metaData.title: Localized cryotherapy machine – a local cryotherapy machine to cure your body
metaData.description: A local cryotherapy machine is an effective device that can cure almost any part of the body. This is a totally safe method that brings great results. Local cryotherapy devices can be used without the risk of frostbites.

whatIs.heading: What is CTN X°Cryo?
whatIs.slide1: The X°Cryo operating principle is based on high volume and velocity of the cooled air, which provides very efficient yet totally safe method to produce thermal shock to the treated area without any risk of frostbites or other side effects.
whatIs.slide2: This is an electric, compact and mobile device with multiple treatment heads. It is an easy and effective solution that would help to reduce pain and make the recovery process faster. It was designed to treat skin, joints and muscles around the body.
whatIs.slide3: All you need is an electricity socket available. There would be no need for special installation. The machine has four wheels which makes it mobile. This technology is ideal for boosting athletic performance and recovery after an injury or a stretch.
whatIs.slide4: Cryotherapy will help you to accelerate muscle recovery and improve its elasticity. It is very useful when it comes to treating back, neck and shoulder pains. The cooled air will reduce swelling and liquid retention, joint pain and inflammation.

howItWork.card1: Produces continuous high volume and velocity air flow with excellent heat extraction capability.
howItWork.card2: Cooling system is based on advanced electric compressor and heat exchange technology providing maintenance free continuous operation.
howItWork.card3: High velocity of air flow enables cryo-cooling of the treatment areas at higher air temperature than previously making the treatments 100% safe.
howItWork.card4: A typical treatment session per area lasts from 3 to 5 minutes. 8 inch touch screen with easy to operate user interface.

tab1.title: Beauty
tab1.content: Reverses signs of ageing, promotes skin tone, reduces cellulite, increases collagen production and provides efficient treatment of variety of skin disorders. Cryo facials are also ideal for reducing puffiness, sagging skin and acne.

tab2.title: Sports
tab2.content: Cryotherapy is a convenient all-in-one solution that can be used in sports to treat injuries. The technology can increase your wellness, reduce pain and enhance blood circulation. Cooled air will soothe painful symptoms after back, neck and shoulder stretch.

tab3.title: Health
tab3.content: With the help of this machine, you can accelerate the recovery process after an injury or a medical operation. It provides relief from chronic and joint pains. It reduces the recovery time of the muscles, which will allow you to resume physical activity in no time.

tab4.title: Wellness
tab4.content: The machine increases the overall wellness of the athletes and people who choose an active lifestyle. A device is great for reducing muscle tension and sore muscles in any part of the body. You will be able to continue your daily workout routine sooner.
